turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a couple pizzas for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, from where would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking Hungry Howies.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Excellent choice. And how many exactly did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2 please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. And what would you like on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like 1 only pepperoni and cheese, and another with pepperoni, bacon, and black olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly. And you said Hungry Howies, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what type of flavored crusts would you like for those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The pepperoni pizza should have butter cheese crust, and the other a garlic and herb crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, 2 orders of Howie Bread.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, will that be all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, let me place the order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, your order has been placed, and will be ready to pickup in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thanks so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Enjoy your meal and have a great day.
